Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class MoveActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.MoveActionController
public class MoveActionController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the Move Action page of the game on this page the user can perform the Move Resources action by choosing the type of move to be carried out and moving the resources of his choice

      private void loadImageResource​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView target, ResourceType resourceType)
      method used to set a generic image of the resources
      Parameters:
      target - imageView to be set with image related to the owned resource
      resourceType - resource to be inserted into the imageView

      Returns:
